about.title: About me
about.bio: Good team worker. Eager to have new work experiences where I can have the opportunity to learn more in the technological field, grow personally and professionally, and thus be able to contribute positively to the achievement of the objectives

work.title: Research & Development
work.description: Research of different technologies to demonstrate if they are implementable in a final product

work.title: Internship
work.description: Research and development of an anomaly detector using an Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning systems

education.description: Specialization in Telematics, where I could learn not only a lot about programming, but also several communication protocols over Internet and other networks

Erasmus+ exchange during my last year's semester. Where I learned a lot about the MEAN Stack (Node.js, Angular8, MongoDB,...), Android & iOS App Development and also improved my skills in Java, CSS or Javascript

skills.skilltext: Usage knowledge in tools for teams' organization and communication such as Trello, Slack, Confluence or Jira. Also good knowledge in Microsoft Office
